name: Mixtape Licscape
description:
Play as a humble electron racing to avoid oblivion along the treacherous path of the Mixtape. Dodge multitudes of Bullets to the beat! With simple controls anyone can master!

Mixtape Licscape is a musical, side-scrolling bullet-hell inspired by Matthew Taranto's Tadpole Treble, completed for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2 by 2 composers: Aero and wilm0x42. Platform support for Web Browser, Windows and Linux.

Shoutout to Godot's Cup
